description:
Zanya and Jin put it all on the line in a Katana World semifinal showdown hoping to advance to the ABC Cup main event. Gao and the gang search for Akatsuki, as he may hold a clue to Genma and Doai’s whereabouts. Sophia reveals a dark truth about herself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mystique Explosion! The Great Katana World Battle!
秘技炸裂! カタナワールド大決戦!!
